targets.query: SELECT 100-mean("usage_idle") AS "Guest" FROM "$retention"."cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100-mean("usage_idle") AS "Guest" FROM "$retention"."cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH key = "host"
list.label: Server
list.name: host

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH key = "host"

list.label: Network
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH key = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "dc" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "interface" != 'all'
